about.text: Since 2019, we have been successfully offering tours and exceptional services based on the principles of blessed tourism (religious tourism) in various Islamic countries with the help of qualified specialists.
about.text1: Our company provides services in religious tourism, academic tourism, business tourism, and health tourism that meet any demand for our compatriots and citizens of neighboring countries.
about.text2: The tour service is offered mainly based on the participants' wishes. Since we often provide hotel and restaurant services based on religious values, most of our passengers choose us for religious/blessed tourism.
